headline: Is Freeport-McMoRan Trading at a Discount After 8% Gain in 2025?
summary: Wondering whether Freeport-McMoRan is attractively priced or if you’re better off waiting for a dip? You’re not alone. It is a good time to take a closer look at what the numbers reveal. The stock has climbed 2.7% over the past week, edged just 0.7% lower over the last month, and has still delivered an 8.4% gain year-to-date, despite being down 4.1% for the past year. Recent moves in copper prices and ongoing buzz around infrastructure spending have kept Freeport-McMoRan in the headlines...

headline: Mining For Opportunity: How Rising AI Demand Is Energizing Uranium And Base Metals
summary: AI infrastructure boom is fueling base metals and uranium demand. TD Cowen's Craig Hutchison discusses how the mining sector is poised to give investors a diversified way to play the AI wave
